name: Superhero Entrance Exam 1
description:
So you've survived being bitten by a radioactive animal, being dropped into a vat of toxic waste, having your DNA altered by some unknown group, or just woke up to discover you can now bench press an elephant. Now you've decided to take part in the thrilling career that is being a superhero. Good for you; not that you have a choice, current laws require that all transbeings (those individuals with special Talents) must register with either the International League of Super-Transbeings (ILOST), if they wish to do good, or with the Legion of Villainous Entities (LOVE), if they wish to do evil, upon turning 18 (or older).

The following exams (more to come later) will determine if you are to be a hero, sidekick, or a member of the homebase support team--such as the tech support person.

Good luck.

_______________________

Credits:

Code editor: Twine

Sounds: Apple GarageBand

Music: Apple GarageBand

Graphic design: ProCreate app 

Illustrations: ProCreate app

Based on characters and settings found in the Joe Rover eBooks.

All characters, organizations, and locations in this game  have no existence outside the imagination of the author/developer and have no relation to anyone bearing the same name or names. Any resemblance to individuals known or unknown to the author/developer are purely coincidental.
